title: Missing key fragment
body:
Hi guys, I had 2 key fragments in loot this evening, and couple of minutes ago I finished match and got another key fragment, but when i go to my loot there is only 2 of them, and the last one is missing, I had quite a few beta client crashes today, maybe it has something to do with it? Is it possible for you to check what is going on? 

Thanks

My name: MRZ002 (EUW)

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and don't see the last key fragment you mentioned. I don't see a reason why something would have caused one to go missing.

If you'd like to have us take a closer look, feel free to submit a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and one of our account specialists will reach back out to you.
